intro:
Bankrupt your friends
Obtaining monopoly and win
description:
Rento is online multiplayer business dice game. It is board game for 2 to 6 players.

Trade lands, build houses, win auctions, roll wheel of fortune, risk in Russian Roulette and most importantly - have fun. 

Obtain monopoly over the game board and bankrupt the other players in order to win.

If you like Ludo or family dice games - you will like Rento too :)

You can play the game in 3 modes: 
• ONLINE (vs real people live) and vs your friends
• SOLO (versus AI robots)
• Pass 'N Play (Pass the same device to others)

In Nintendo Switch, Rento supports touch screen, JoyCon mode and TV mode

Enjoy one of the best board games ever made.

Good luck
